titleStmt.title: The second book of the Pleasant musical companion being a new collection of select catches, songs and glees : for two and three voices.
Pleasant musical companion. Book 2.
titleStmt.author: Playford, John, 1623-1686?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and much enlarged.

notesStmt.note: The second book of The pleasant musical companion, the first of which was originally compiled by John Hilton, entitled, Catch that catch can (1652).
Imperfect: signature A4 at beginning lacking in Bodleian Library copy (reel 1536:9); British Library copy (reel 193:3) lacks signatures A3-4 at end.
Identified on film as Wing S2260 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in British Library and Bodleian Library.
